alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 12:27PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1227 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Loxahatchee NWR, or 10 miles northwest of Coral Springs, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Deerfield Beach, Wellington, Margate, Coconut Creek, Royal Palm Beach, Parkland, Loxahatchee NWR, Mission Bay, Godfrey Road, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Whisper Walk, Loxahatchee Groves, Hillsboro Ranches, Hillsboro Pines, Ramblewood East, South County Regional Park, and Sandalfoot Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
